item.title: PARA
item.description: score:-42 Chances: Surprise Q2 profit reported by Paramount Global. Revenues beat expectations in Q2 2023. Positive impact of subscriber growth on earnings. Company’s commitment to ending strikes and adjusting fall lineup. Paramount Global to sell Simon & Schuster in a $1.62 billion deal.
